creator: bn@smartobjects.be
text:
The javadoc parameters are not consistent with the parameters available for 
javac. Namely includeAntRuntime and includeJavaRuntime parameters are not 
present in javadoc task.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: What would you want to use them for?

I'm setting this bug as invalid. Feel free to reopen if you can provide a 
description of what the parameters could be used for.
creator: sbailliez@apache.org
